content: **crochet drops jacket in alaska snow symphony silke-tweed and glitter ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl finished measurements bust 90-98-106-116-126 cm / 35-5/8 - 38-5/8 - 41 75 - 45-5/8 - 49-5/8 hem 80-88-96-106-116 cm / 31 5 - 34-5/8 - 37 75 - 41 75 - 45--5/8 materials drops alaska from garnstudio 300-300-350-400-400 g colour no 02 off white and use drops snow from garnstudio 250-250-250-300-350 g colour no 01 off white and use drops symphony from garnstudio 100-150-150-150-150 g colour no 01 off white 50 - 50 - 50 - 50 - 50 g colour no 02 beige and use drops silke-tweed from garnstudio 100-100-100-100-100 g colour no 01 off-white tweed 50 - 50-100-100-100 g colour no 17 off white and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool for all sizes of colour no 01 gold 6 drops dark wood buttons nr 535 drops 7 mm / us k crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge
